Class# MTLTextureViewDescriptor

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

class MTLTextureViewDescriptor

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/Metal/MTLTextureViewDescriptor#Instance-Properties)

[`var levelRange: Range<Int>`](/documentation/metal/mtltextureviewdescriptor/levelrange-55q8m)A desired range of mip levels of a texture view.[`var pixelFormat: MTLPixelFormat`](/documentation/metal/mtltextureviewdescriptor/pixelformat)[`var sliceRange: Range<Int>`](/documentation/metal/mtltextureviewdescriptor/slicerange-6nq6v)A desired range of slices of a texture view.[`var swizzle: MTLTextureSwizzleChannels`](/documentation/metal/mtltextureviewdescriptor/swizzle)[`var textureType: MTLTextureType`](/documentation/metal/mtltextureviewdescriptor/texturetype)## [Relationships](/documentation/Metal/MTLTextureViewDescriptor#relationships)
